phrases.translation: n. 飞行控制；飞行指挥
航班号；班机号码；飞机班次

n. 飞行时间；飞越时间
飞行模拟器；飞行模拟装置；飞行练习器
机组人员；飞行人员；空勤人员

sentences.sentence: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.translation: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.sentence: There are only three flights a day to Logan Airport from Heathrow.
sentences.translation: 希思罗机场每天只有三趟飞往洛根机场的航班。

sentences.sentence: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.translation: 由于大公司的竞争，他的生意陷入了困境。

sentences.sentence: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.translation: 由于报酬低，该城市雇用得到的临时工程师就更少了。

sentences.sentence: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.translation: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境， 现在正面临灭绝的危险。

phrases.translation: n. 外国直接投资，对外直接投资
直接喷射；直接注入；直接射出法

sentences.sentence: You can fly direct from Seattle to Europe.
sentences.translation: 你可以从西雅图直飞欧洲。

phrases.translation: 试点项目，试点工程；样板工程，样板设计
n. 初步研究；预备试验；飞行员研究
n. 试验工场；小规模试验厂
试点计划，试点工程；实验计画
长明小灯；常燃小火；标灯（等于pilot lamp）

sentences.sentence: an airline pilot
sentences.translation: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.sentence: a fighter pilot
sentences.translation: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.sentence: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.translation: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

phrases.translation: 成功；在…方面成功；顺利完成
成功地做了…，成功地做某事

sentences.sentence: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.translation: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

sentences.sentence: They can be applied in any context, as long as you understand how to apply them, of course.
sentences.translation: 他们可以在任何一种背景下应用，当然，只要你懂得如何去应用他们。

sentences.sentence: Why, in its presence, should I deny the joy of living, as long as I know everything is not included in this joy?
sentences.translation: 为什么在生活的快乐明明存在时，只要我知道一切都不存在于这种快乐中，我就会否认这种快乐？

sentences.sentence: But he said as long as we remained the only intelligent life in our galaxy and avoided destroying ourselves we should be safe.
sentences.translation: 但是他说只要我们保持在我们的星系中是唯一有智力的生命并且避免破坏我们自己，我们就会安全。

sentences.sentence: a shortage of jobs for school-leavers
sentences.translation: 中学毕业生就业岗位的短缺

translations.translation: 确切地；完全；[口]（表示赞同）确实如此

sentences.sentence: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.translation: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.sentence: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.translation: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

phrases.translation: 尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

sentences.sentence: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.translation: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.sentence: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.translation: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.sentence: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.translation: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

参谋；非军事工作的军官
获授权人员；特准人员；授权签字人

sentences.sentence: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.translation: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

sentences.sentence: He understands – he’s not stupid.
sentences.translation: 他明白——他又不笨。

sentences.sentence: I couldn’t do it, and it made me feel stupid.
sentences.translation: 这件事我做不来，这让我感到自己很愚蠢。

sentences.sentence: He wouldn't take his hat off.
sentences.translation: 他不愿脱下他的帽子。

phrases.translation: 羽绒服；鸭绒衣；羽绒夹克

sentences.sentence: Gene has to wear a jacket and tie to work.
sentences.translation: 吉恩上班得穿西装打领带。

sentences.sentence: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.translation: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.sentence: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.translation: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.sentence: No, that’s not ours.
sentences.translation: 不，那不是我们的。

phrases.translation: 占用；包扎；绑好；缚牢；阻碍；密切联系；合伙；停泊

[机]球接头；转向横拉杆球铰接头
n. 小白领结；全套男式晚礼服

sentences.sentence: I wear a shirt and tie at work.
sentences.translation: 我上班穿衬衫打领带。

phrases.translation: v. 从容胜过；一路领先

sentences.sentence: (= many rows ) of shelves stacked with books
sentences.translation: 一排又一排堆满书的架子

phrases.translation: （有六个落袋的）台球台；桌球台
汽车合伙；汽车合用组织
专利联营；专利权共享互用的一组企业
[英国俚语]欺诈(或不正当、不道德)行为，欺骗的手法，不公平的竞技

sentences.sentence: They have a nice pool in their backyard.
sentences.translation: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.sentence: a shallow pool suitable for children
sentences.translation: 适合儿童的浅水池

phrases.translation: (与 on， upon 连用) 下判决；定案
二人之间交换（言语，手势，暗号等）
通过测试；经受住考验；试验合格

sentences.sentence: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.translation: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.sentence: The main railway line passes just north of Manchester.
sentences.translation: 那条铁路干线正好经过曼彻斯特北面。

phrases.translation: 次级资料；二手数据；二级信息

sentences.sentence: the novel’s secondary characters
sentences.translation: 这本小说中的次要人物

sentences.sentence: The formal education sector comprises primary and secondary school institutions.
sentences.translation: 正式教育机构包括初级和中等教育机构。

sentences.sentence: He is trying to set up a new secondary school in Acton because he is not satisfied with the choice facing his four children under six.
sentences.translation: 他也正努力在阿克顿建立一所新的中等学校。 他对他那四个不到六岁的孩子将要面临的选择而不满。

sentences.sentence: The government provides free education at both primary and secondary school levels and provides some financial assistance for private schools.
sentences.translation: 政府对初级和中级学校都提供免费教育，并对私立学校给予一定的经济支持。

sentences.sentence: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.translation: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

phrases.translation: 为大家的利益承担危险
n. 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔（电话发明者）
使某人想起某事，使人回忆起
n. [美]独立钟（指美国费城独立厅的大钟，1776年7月4日鸣此钟宣布美国独立，1835年被损）

sentences.sentence: church bells
sentences.translation: 教堂的钟

sentences.sentence: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.translation: 世界上的富国

sentences.sentence: I was sitting on the floor shivering with fear because a bullet had been fired through a window.
sentences.translation: 我坐在地板上吓得浑身发抖，因为有一颗子弹射穿窗户打了进来。

translations.translation: （用于表示过去真实或经常性的行为，特别强调现在不那样了）过去

sentences.sentence: He used to go to our school.
sentences.translation: 他曾在我们学校就读。

sentences.sentence: We’re eating out more often than we used to.
sentences.translation: 我们现在出去吃饭的次数比以前多了。

phrases.translation: 国富论（书名，作者是亚当·斯密）

sentences.sentence: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.translation: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.sentence: the distribution of wealth
sentences.translation: 财富的分配

sentences.sentence: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.translation: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

phrases.translation: 双星（紧密相连的二颗星，借望远镜始可分辨者）
双效；双重效果；双重影响
双边的；双面板；双面材质
双声道，双声轨（录音磁带）

sentences.sentence: The church has doubled its membership in the last five years.
sentences.translation: 这座教堂的会众在过去的五年里增加了一倍。

phrases.translation:
极难得,简直不,几乎不：

He seldom or never drinks.
他简直可以说滴酒不沾。

sentences.sentence: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.translation: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

phrases.translation: 不遗余力；抽出；宽容；节省
在他闲暇的时候；在他业余时间里
备用容量；闲置的生产能力

sentences.sentence: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.translation: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.sentence: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.translation: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.sentence: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.translation: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.sentence: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.translation: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.sentence: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.translation: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

sentences.sentence: In her spare time she read books on cooking.
sentences.translation: 她在业余时间读些烹饪方面的书。

sentences.sentence: Uncle Herbert never argued, never spoke up for himself.
sentences.translation: 赫伯特叔叔从不争论，从不为自己辩护。

phrases.translation: 充耳不闻；不加理睬；不愿听

sentences.sentence: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.translation: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.sentence: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.translation: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.sentence: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.translation: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.sentence: Tom was born profoundly deaf (= having great difficulty hearing ) .
sentences.translation: 汤姆天生几乎全聋。

sentences.sentence: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.translation: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.sentence: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.translation: 耳环很小。

sentences.sentence: a tiny little baby
sentences.translation: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.sentence: She always felt a tiny bit sad.
sentences.translation: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.sentence: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.translation: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.sentence: tiny pieces of paper
sentences.translation: 碎纸屑片

phrases.translation: 电设备；电器设备，用电设备；电气设备；电器类

sentences.sentence: an electric blanket
sentences.translation: 电热毯

phrases.translation: 偶然遇见（碰见，发现）；停落于
暴露；真相大白；众所周知

sentences.sentence: We waited for the lights to change.
sentences.translation: 我们等着红绿灯转换。

sentences.sentence: Eventually the lights turned green.
sentences.translation: 绿灯终于亮了。

sentences.sentence: The driver had failed to stop at a red light.
sentences.translation: 红灯亮时司机没有把车停下。

phrases.translation: [常用于否定句或疑问句]值得，合算，划得来
n. [物理]烛光（国际单位制中的照明单位）

sentences.sentence: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.translation: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.sentence: The wind flared the candle.
sentences.translation: 风吹得烛光闪动。

sentences.sentence: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.translation: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.sentence: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.translation: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.sentence: Curtis Matthews, a retired postman from North Carolina, was running the bar as a favour to his brother, who had left Louisiana after the attempt on his life the year before.
sentences.translation: 柯蒂斯·马修斯是一名来自南卡罗来纳的邮递员。 在因约翰·马修斯生命受到威胁而离开路易斯安那州以后，他就帮哥哥经营着酒店。

phrases.translation: 被忽视，被冷落， 孤零零地未介入

sentences.sentence: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.translation: 我冷得发抖。

sentences.sentence: Don’t go out in the cold without your coat!
sentences.translation: 外面很冷，穿上外套再出去！

sentences.sentence: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.translation: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.sentence: Angela liked to rest during the heat of the day (= the hottest part of the day ).
sentences.translation: 安杰拉喜欢在一天中最热的时段休息一下。

sentences.sentence: Firefighters were beaten back by the intense heat.
sentences.translation: 消防队员被高温迫得后退。

phrases.translation: 全日制学生；全职学生，脱产学生

sentences.sentence: ...a full-time job.
sentences.translation: …一份全职工作。

phrases.translation: 发挥作用；扮演一个角色
n. 行为榜样；角色模特
起主要作用， 起带头作用

sentences.sentence: Until now scientists had very little clear evidence about the drug's role in preventing more serious effects of infection.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，科学家们几乎没有该药物在防止更严重的感染后果的功能的明确证据。

phrases.translation: 高等教育（指含大学以上的教育）
远程教育；广播教育，函授教育
n. 初等教育，基本教育（指小学）

sentences.sentence: She also hopes her children will get a good education.
sentences.translation: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.sentence: efforts to improve girls’ access to education
sentences.translation: 为增加女孩受教育机会所作的努力

phrases.translation: 公路运输；铁路运输；陆路运输
沉积物运移；泥沙流移；土砂流送
n. 运输能力，输送能力

sentences.sentence: commuters who travel on public transport
sentences.translation: 乘坐公共交通车辆上下班的人

sentences.sentence: It’s easier to get to the college if you have your own transport (= a car, bicycle etc ) .
sentences.translation: 如果你有自己的交通工具，去学院就会更方便。

sentences.sentence: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.translation: 尼科尔斯启程前往他位于康涅狄格州的偏远农舍。

sentences.sentence: The president's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.translation: 总统特使再次踏上外交之旅。

phrases.translation: vt. 阻止…飞行；关闭…不许飞机起落

sentences.sentence: a pair of socks
sentences.translation: 一双短袜

sentences.sentence: white ankle socks
sentences.translation: 白色的齐踝短袜

sentences.sentence: The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.translation: 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.sentence: Shops are no longer allowed to push up their prices whenever they want.
sentences.translation: 再不允许商店想什么时候提价就提价了。

phrases.translation: 适当的时候；[物理]原时；本征时间
本征函数；本寨数，特寨数

sentences.sentence: Everything was in its proper place (= where it should be ) .
sentences.translation: 每样东西都放在恰当的位置。

sentences.sentence: the proper way to clean your teeth
sentences.translation: 正确的刷牙方法

sentences.sentence: The proper name for Matthew’s condition is hyperkinetic syndrome.
sentences.translation: 马修的病的恰当名称是多动症。

phrases.translation: 前沿；居领先优势；最先着风的帆缘
直尺，平尺；校正装置，直棱

sentences.sentence: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.translation: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.sentence: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.translation: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.sentence: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.translation: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.sentence: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.translation: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.sentence: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.translation: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.sentence: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.translation: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.sentence: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.translation: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

sentences.sentence: A few minutes later the bomb went off, destroying the vehicle.
sentences.translation: 几分钟后炸弹爆炸了，摧毁了那辆车。

sentences.sentence: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.translation: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.sentence: pictures of starving children
sentences.translation: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.sentence: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.translation: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

phrases.translation: 继续；过去；继续下去；发生
参加；（太阳等）被云遮住；放得进
[口语]第一次尝试；一下子，一口气

sentences.sentence: ‘I can’t open this drawer.’ ‘Here, let me have a go .’
sentences.translation: “我打不开这个抽屉。”“来，让我试试看。”

sentences.sentence: On the tour, everyone can have a go at making a pot.
sentences.translation: 这次去参观，每个人都可以试着做一个陶罐。

sentences.sentence: I’d thought about it for some time and decided to give it a go (= try to do something ) .
sentences.translation: 这事我考虑了一段时间，决定尝试一下。

sentences.sentence: I had a good go (= tried hard ) at cleaning the silver.
sentences.translation: 我费了老大的劲清洁银器。

sentences.sentence: I’m not sure it will work but it’s worth a go .
sentences.translation: 我不知道这是否可行，但是值得一试。

sentences.sentence: If you have emails or memos to write, do them all in one go.
sentences.translation: 如果你有电子邮件或者备忘录可以写写，就一口气全部做了。

sentences.sentence: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.translation: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

sentences.sentence: You certainly couldn't eat it all in one go anyway, it wouldn't be a romantic moment.
sentences.translation: 无论如何，你都肯定不可能一口气吃掉这只牡蛎，何况那样做的话，也肯定不那么浪漫。

phrases.translation: 岩体；岩块，岩块体；岩石层
比较轻柔的摇滚乐；软岩石
岩石边坡；石坡；岩石坡；石流坡
火山岩；火成岩；火山碎屑岩
重摇滚；剧烈摇滚乐；硬质岩石
n. 储集岩；贮油岩；储油岩石

sentences.sentence: To build the tunnel, they had to cut through 500 feet of solid rock .
sentences.translation: 为了建这条隧道，他们不得不凿穿500英尺的坚硬岩石。

sentences.sentence: Most of the country is desert and bare rock .

sentences.sentence: However, it is found in the study of mountain tourist hotel , the important matter in hotel design is try one's best to saving fund in build hotel and obtain maximal economy advantage.
